mapper.insert: insert into booth (member_id, screen_id, seat_name, booth_date, booth_status) values (#{member_id}, #{screen_id}, #{seat_name}, #{booth_date}, #{booth_status});
mapper.select: select b.*, m.movie_nm, t.theater_name, r.room_name from booth b join screen s on b.screen_id = s.screen_id join movie m on s.movie_id = m.movie_id join theater t on s.theater_id = t.theater_id join rooms r on s.room_id = r.room_id where b.booth_id = #{booth_id}
select m.* from screen s join movie m on s.movie_id = m.movie_id where s.screen_id = #{screen_id}
